name: DLAnalytics
description:
- A unified Analytics for iOS/MacOS application written in Swift. 
- Modularize, Centralize Analytics.
- Plugin the new Analytics easier.
- Prevent duplicated code tracking Analytics.
- Standadize tracking method and event.
